explains: vi. 啪地落下；噗通一声坠落

sentences.en: I added a dollop of vanilla ice cream to the pie.
sentences.cn: 我在馅饼中加了一块香草冰淇淋。

sentences.en: A dollop of romance now and then is good for everybody.
sentences.cn: 时而来点儿浪漫对每个人都有好处。

sentences.en: She put a dollop if ice-cream in each bowl.
sentences.cn: 她在每个碗里放了一团冰淇淋。
